description: Meta-agents for developing the MultiAgent-Claude framework itself
purpose: These agents are used exclusively for framework self-development and should not be distributed to user projects

agents.name: meta-development-orchestrator
agents.purpose: Orchestrate framework self-improvement using the framework's own agents

agents.name: agent-factory
agents.purpose: Create new agent templates for the framework

agents.name: template-evolution-tracker
agents.purpose: Track and analyze template evolution patterns

commands.name: validate-templates
commands.purpose: Validate all agent templates for consistency

commands.name: generate-agent
commands.purpose: Interactive agent creation following best practices

usage_notes.distribution: These agents should NEVER be copied to user projects via 'mac init'
usage_notes.access: Use 'mac meta' commands to work with meta-agents
